MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA4 postcode area of Warrington, affecting properties in Poachers Lane, Thelwall Lane and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:23 am. We are aware of previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 12:30 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:10 am on 29th December, 2020.
